thread.title: Kraton Performance to Buy Arizona Chemical for $1.37 Billion
thread.title_full: Kraton Performance to Buy Arizona Chemical for $1.37 Billion - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Kraton Performance to Buy Arizona Chemical for $1.37 Billion
text:
Kraton Performance Polymers Inc. said Monday that it has agreed to buy closely held Arizona Chemical Holdings Corp. for $1.37 billion in cash.
Arizona Chemical makes chemicals found in things like breakfast cereal packaging and car tires from renewable...
